 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפ֑וּנָה‎</span> [[Ps.88.16|Ps 88:16]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">ἄρ</span>. <span class="bdbLangGreek">λεγ</span> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>Pr 135 f.</sup> compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***appuna(ma)***</u></abbr> adv. = <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ma°diš***</u></abbr>, ***very, very much***, but dubious; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#MV|MV]] form from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פון‎</span> &amp; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhIAAiAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAgACIAAAJdjI+py+0Po5yg2vkswFHzvH1gKCoaWabqiqBOxZyGa8qJd9AtLun7B2PdfKpg0Wgs8ZIiW4C4YD4vMwwVhQTtTtSqKYe98Ly/GPTVOKeJ6nW0bSaNm1z4iyvM6xkFADs="> ***diminuit, mente diminuit*** ([[BDB#Frey|Frey]]), hence ***be confused, helpless***, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἐξηπθρήθην</span> [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] ***contur-batus sum***; others emend <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפוּגָה‎</span> from  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּג‎</span> q. v. A verb however is not needed for parallelism). **\*\***Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in fact = ***milk*** (camel, etc.) ***dry, empty***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***empty-headed man***; this does not support ***be confused, helpless*** (GFM, privately). 



<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6437|פָּנָה]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּן‎</span>] **verb** (?); only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפוּנָה‎</span> [[Ps.88.16|Ps 88:16]] read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפּוֺגָה‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פוג‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפוּנָה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺנֶה‎</span> [[2Chr.25.23|2Chr 25:23]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּנָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּנִי‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּאָה‎</span>. above
